name: Team03-Secret Garden
description:
Explore different areas to find 5 types of elements and give them to the animals.    Be guided by the sound of the bells to find the elements that will restore the balance of this world and revive the King Tree.

Secret Garden is a dreamlike colorful game inspired by traditional Belgian puppet theaters for staging flat graphic elements resembling paper or cardboard, and Japan for its landscapes and the concept of Godai. 

By its themes, the game aims to raising awareness of the environmental cause by contemplating its beauty and taking care of our safe place.

Controls

ZQSD or Arrows to move the protagonist.

Story

You and your twin created an amazing secret garden (metaphore of your secret garden mind ) where you can be yourself, out of this rude, and in sensibility crisis world we know. Unlike you, your twin didn’t resist the pressure and fell apart. With all the pain, the hunger and the fear he felt, he eventually ate all the magic apples of the King Tree to make himself stronger, even though it would undangered all the garden and its magic elementary creatures, and transform himself into a monster of despair.

Your role must be to plant another king tree to rehabilit balance in the garden and save corrupted creatures, by collecting all the missing elements that went wrong with the garden collapse (Wind, earth, fire, water and Void, essential for the matter balance,  despite its rarity). You must save your afraid and lost twin at the same time, the true key, with you, of the garden survey.
